org.mapdb

Interface Serializer<A>

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BTreeMap.BTreeRootSerializer, EncryptionXTEA, HTreeMap.HashRootSerializer, Queues.CircularQueueRootSerializer, Queues.QueueRootSerializer, Queues.SimpleQueue.NodeSerializer, Queues.StackRootSerializer, Serializer.CompressSerializerWrapper, SerializerBase, SerializerPojo

    public interface Serializer<A>

    Provides serialization and deserialization

    Author:
    Jan Kotek

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Serializer.CompressSerializerWrapper<E> 

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Serializer<Object> BASIC_SERIALIZER
      basic serializer for most classes in ‘java.lang’ and ‘java.util’ packages
      static Serializer<Boolean> BOOLEAN_SERIALIZER 
      static Serializer<byte[]> BYTE_ARRAY_SERIALIZER 
      static Serializer<byte[]> CRC32_CHECKSUM
      Adds CRC32 checksum at end of each record to check data integrity.
      static Serializer<Object> EMPTY_SERIALIZER
      always writes zero length data, and always deserializes it as an empty String
      static Serializer<Integer> INTEGER_SERIALIZER
      Serializes Integer into 4 bytes, used mainly for testing.
      static Serializer<Long> LONG_SERIALIZER
      Serializes Long into 8 bytes, used mainly for testing.
      static Serializer<String> STRING_SERIALIZER
      Serializes strings using UTF8 encoding.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      A deserialize(DataInput in, int available)
      Deserialize the content of an object from a DataInput.
      void serialize(DataOutput out, A value)
      Serialize the content of an object into a ObjectOutput

    • Field Detail

      • STRING_SERIALIZER

        static final Serializer<String> STRING_SERIALIZER

        Serializes strings using UTF8 encoding. Used mainly for testing. Does not handle null values.

      • LONG_SERIALIZER

        static final Serializer<Long> LONG_SERIALIZER

        Serializes Long into 8 bytes, used mainly for testing. Does not handle null values.

      • INTEGER_SERIALIZER

        static final Serializer<Integer> INTEGER_SERIALIZER

        Serializes Integer into 4 bytes, used mainly for testing. Does not handle null values.

      • BOOLEAN_SERIALIZER

        static final Serializer<Boolean> BOOLEAN_SERIALIZER

      • EMPTY_SERIALIZER

        static final Serializer<Object> EMPTY_SERIALIZER

        always writes zero length data, and always deserializes it as an empty String

      • BASIC_SERIALIZER

        static final Serializer<Object> BASIC_SERIALIZER

        basic serializer for most classes in ‘java.lang’ and ‘java.util’ packages

      • CRC32_CHECKSUM

        static final Serializer<byte[]> CRC32_CHECKSUM

        Adds CRC32 checksum at end of each record to check data integrity. It throws ‘IOException(“CRC32 does not match, data broken”)’ on de-serialization if data are corrupted

      • BYTE_ARRAY_SERIALIZER

        static final Serializer<byte[]> BYTE_ARRAY_SERIALIZER

    • Method Detail

      • serialize

        void serialize(DataOutput out,
             A value)
               throws IOException

        Serialize the content of an object into a ObjectOutput

        Parameters:
        out - ObjectOutput to save object into
        value - Object to serialize
        Throws:
        IOException

      • deserialize

        A deserialize(DataInput in,
            int available)
              throws IOException

        Deserialize the content of an object from a DataInput.

        Parameters:
        in - to read serialized data from
        available - how many bytes are available in DataInput for reading, may be -1 (in streams) or 0 (null).
        Returns:
        deserialized object
        Throws:
        IOException
